Title: Valid login
Steps: 1. Enter user@example.com 2. Enter abc12345 3. Click Sign in

Title: Empty email
Steps: 1. Leave email blank 2. Enter abc12345 3. Click Sign in

Title: Invalid email format
Steps: 1. Enter user@domain 2. Enter abc12345 3. Click Sign in

Title: Weak password
Steps: 1. Enter user@example.com 2. Enter abcdefgh 3. Click Sign in
Expected Result: Warning: 'Weak password: use 8+ characters with at least one number.'

Title: Empty password
Steps: 1. Enter user@example.com 2. Leave password blank 3. Click Sign in

Title: Password with only numbers
Steps: 1. Enter user@example.com 2. Enter 12345678 3. Click Sign in
Expected Result: Warning: 'Weak password: use 8+ characters with at least one number.'

Title: Password with only letters
Steps: 1. Enter user@example.com 2. Enter abcdefgh 3. Click Sign in
Expected Result: Warning: 'Weak password: use 8+ characters with at least one number.'

Title: Remember me toggle
Steps: 1. Enter user@example.com 2. Enter abc12345 3. Check 'Remember me' 4. Click Sign in

Title: Forgot password link
Expected Result: Message: 'Forgot password flow is not implemented in this demo.'

Title: Double-click Sign in
Steps: 1. Enter user@example.com 2. Enter abc12345 3. Double-click Sign in quickly
Expected Result: Message appears once; no duplicate submissions
